channel.title: New form of script (bank walker)
channel.description: i thought this up a while ago but never shared my idea with anyone yet........well here is my idea.......have a script that starts inside mining guild right near ladder and have it walk to bank with a full load of coal when someone (your main) gives it a load of coal to bank. this "walker" would then return to bottom of ladder and wait for another load. (eliminating the walk to and from the guild). this could also be used for other places that require a great deal of walking to and from bank. this would allow your main to gain xp while also gaining resources.

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

How about you guys just walk to there yourself? its not hard, just have your script climb the ladder(using findobject) then have it click the top of the minimap, then click the bank symbol Oh noes its to hard.

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

ore hoar dynasty:

that half of a minute can be used to mine instead of dropping ore which you would be doing if you were powermining…it doesnt seem like a long time but when you add up all of the seconds…it makes a difference. (it doesnt just have to be for the guild)

Im sorry but for a Half a Minute advanateg i wouldnt risk banning a char i play legit on.

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Dankness, post:16, topic:3648”] How would this be impossible look in the misc folder and skill folders of SRL theres Amount.SRL, BuySell.SRL, Trade Window Font and amillion other things to do with trading. with virtual pc you can run multi scars on multi rs clients as a Virtual PC acts as a seperate pc so it’d be like using 2 comps. This script wouldnt be very hard to make honestly, i do belive masqurador already made a execellent Merchanting script to use the features he made that it alkd about earler. Nothing is Impossible When You Belive you Can Do IT.

-Dankness[/quote]

But, this script would be pretty pointless…

Why not just bank the damn ores?

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

dude it wont have to trade u at a certain time. it will wait at the certain spot outside of mine or wherever the script is ment to be ran at and then when u mine a full load, you will trade it and it will click on the trade thing in the chat box then accept ores or whatever and go bank it and come back and wait for more.

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

lol, i hate talkign to people who dont know shit about scar scripting

here

okay its really hard to create a trading script, but its also very hard to create a script that will trade with you at the right time, and then go and bank it, then come back, and repeat that over and over again, for one, its a waste of time, it would be easier to make a mine and bank script instead. plus scar wouldnt be able to see the colors on the virtual machine becasue it need to have it ontop(one of the flawse of scar)

test this for your self, okay first open a piant window and make it all black, then open another one, center scar on this one, make it all red then pick a poitn there and use

if getcolor function then writeln('found it')

minimize the window(or move it to the back) and then run scar, it wont work…

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

so there you have it,this would be a good script to make and not “too” hard. u would just have to set up virtual windows.

Read full topic

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @seifer225 seifer225
item.description:
@seifer225 wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:7, topic:3648”]i dont understand how u can run one on windows???

i mean you would have to use silent mouse right??? wich then would get your account banned, plus the account it was working with…

there isnt a way to make this script, just give it up mate[/quote]

Have you not read anything in this thread??? If you look above you will se you can use either 2 computers or virtual windows, so you dont need silent mouse at all.
Anyways i dont think it will be to hard to trade stuff, the SRL script does it and you could use text detection and BMP’s for the trade button. Walking back would be a bitch but if you get the tolerence right you would be fine

Read full topic

@mjordan wrote:

lol dude calm down. i know the new color change update is a bitch but walkin from the fally east bank to outside the guild isnt that far(but will save you time).and u wont have to have a script for your main, he is just wanting to mine it by hisself and then run one script on a virtual windows then let it trade him and bank it. i know it will be kinda hard to get it to trade you good but it could be done

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ore hoar dynasty:

actually…you can run it on one computer using virtual windows. and he doesnt have to wait in the mining guild ( he can wait outside near the ladder).

yep you are exactly right. there is a very nice tut on how to set up virtual windows somewhere on here. gonna try it when i get back from vacation.just use the search button and find it. this is actually not a bad idea at all ore hoar dynasty. i could use it alot and it shouldnt be too hard to make, hopefully one of the more talented scripters can help make a good one.

item.title: New form of script (bank walker)
item.dc:creator: @dead_link dead_link
item.description:
@dead_link wrote:

but theres a “LITTLE” problem
if u run this walker, u wont be able to use the same pc to mine coz scar CONTROLS the mouse
so either u have to use 2 pcs, or get a friend to mine on ur/his account and get the walker to get teh coal
so in a way its pretty pointless
and anyway if the walker can enter the minining guild, its better to just let him mine the coal himself using a guidlminer

Read full topic
